title: Accessing a URL without any webapps deployed returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, I receive a HTTP response with status code 200 OK and no content.
EB: I expected to receive a HTTP response with status code 404, indicating that the requested webpage could not be found.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL
4. Note the HTTP response status code and content
